sourcesContent:
Admin Dashboard

Courses

  • {{ course.title }} - ${{ course.price }}

Edit Course

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CourseService, Course } from '../../services/course.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-admin-dashboard', templateUrl: './admin-dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./admin-dashboard.component.scss'], }) export class AdminDashboardComponent implements OnInit { courses: Course[] = []; editCourse: Course = { id: 0, title: '', imageUrl: '', price: 0, }; constructor(private courseService: CourseService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.loadCourses(); } loadCourses(): void { this.courseService.getAllCourses().subscribe((data) => { this.courses = data; }); } addCourse(): void { this.courseService.addCourse(this.editCourse).subscribe(() => { this.loadCourses(); this.editCourse = { id: 0, title: '', imageUrl: '', price: 0 }; }); } updateCourse(id: number, course: Course): void { this.courseService.updateCourse(id, course).subscribe(() => { this.loadCourses(); this.editCourse = { id: 0, title: '', imageUrl: '', price: 0 }; }); } deleteCourse(id: number): void { this.courseService.deleteCourse(id).subscribe(() => { this.loadCourses(); }); } // Method to copy course details into the editCourse object setEditCourse(course: Course): void { this.editCourse = { ...course }; } }
